pageContext.claim: “The regime intimidated international inspectors into not using the full inspection authorities that the agreement calls for.”
pageContext.analysis: The International Atomic Energy Agency, which conducts the inspections, has not complained of lack of access. After Trump's speech, the head of the agency issued his own statement: “So far, the IAEA has had access to all locations it needed to visit. At present, Iran is subject to the world’s most robust nuclear verification regime.”
